k12_education_wikipedia.db.description: Elementary and high school level educational content

college_education_wikipedia.db.description: College and graduate level academic content

technical_enhanced_wikipedia.db.description: Technical, engineering, and computer science content

agriculture_enhanced_wikipedia.db.description: Agriculture, farming, and environmental science content

notes: All databases use standardized SQLite schema compatible with existing NATNA structure
Articles include Wikipedia URLs for reference
Content is organized by academic level for appropriate educational targeting
Databases are offline-ready - no runtime API dependencies
Classification ensures K-12 content is age-appropriate while college content covers advanced topics
